subject: Al Thani Finance House
body:
Al Thani Finance House
13 Al Corniche Street,#900,
Zone Number 06,
Off Salwa Road, Doha.
 
Dear  
 
I am Mr. Syed Mohammed Ahmed, General Managing Director Al-Thani Finance House.
 
We are offering corporate and personal loans at 3% interest rate for the duration of 14 years. We provide a broad range of services to both commercial and private clients. As a major Qatar loan firm, we serve local, regional, national and international customers.
We also pay 1.2% commission to brokers who introduce project owners for finance or other opportunities.
I will await your kind response, if you are interested in more details.
 
Yours faithfully
Mr. Syed Mohammed Ahmed
Director Finance & Account
Al-Thani Finance House

subject: Re:   Al Thani Finance House
body:
Dear Mr. Syed Mohammed Ahmed,

Thank you for your offer. I am interested in learning more about the services you provide, particularly in regards to personal loans. Could you please provide me with more details such as the terms and conditions, repayment plans, and any other relevant information?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Robert
